projects.name: 001: Sign Up
projects.description: A sign up modal with form validation and animated feedback.

projects.name: 002: Credit Card Checkout
projects.description: A credit card checkout screen with form validation, credit card type detection (examples provided) and animated feedback.

projects.name: 003: Landing Page
projects.description: A landing page with rotating background images and a sign up input with email validation and animated feedback.

projects.name: 004: Calculator
projects.description: A simple, functional calculator with basic error handling and equation logging that accepts both button and keyboard inputs.

projects.name: 005: App Icon
projects.description: A mobile app icon mockup for PeakBucket, a real life project.
